General.Name: Appro Photoelectron Inc.
General.Description: Appro Photoelectron Inc. operates as a design house for image products to enable customers to develop products in Taiwan. It offers camera module solutions, body worn cameras, and car DVR solutions; and image related products for consumer products, surveillance, law enforcement, industrial, robot, factory, and medical applications. The company also provides system integration and design, and FAE technical support services. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
